content.question: The excerpt most strongly highlights which of the following historical issues?

choices.label: The leadership of Congress in foreign policy
The impact of a military-industrial complex
The influence of the news media on government decision making
The power of the executive branch during periods of crisis

content.answer: The power of the executive branch during periods of crisis

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
